FormPrompt.description: A prompt to present to the user to encourage filling out metadata

id.description: The unique id for this prompt. This must be GLOBALLY unique.

structuredPropertyParams.description:
An optional set of information specific to structured properties prompts.
This should be filled out if the prompt is type STRUCTURED_PROPERTY or FIELDS_STRUCTURED_PROPERTY.

required.description: Whether the prompt is required to be completed, in order for the form to be marked as complete.

urn.description: The structured property that is required on this entity
